channel.title: Tracker Systems Blog
channel.description: Production management insights, product updates, and best practices for garment decoration businesses.

item.title: 5 Ways to Streamline Your Garment Decoration Workflow
item.description: Discover practical strategies to optimize your garment decoration processes and increase production efficiency without sacrificing quality.

item.title: Understanding Screen Printing vs. DTG: Which is Right for Your Business?
item.description: A comprehensive comparison of screen printing and direct-to-garment (DTG) printing to help you choose the right technology for your specific business needs.

item.title: New Integration Platform Features: Connect with Your Favorite E-commerce Platforms
item.description: We're excited to announce new integration capabilities that connect Tracker directly with popular e-commerce platforms like Shopify and WooCommerce.
